ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Days of Milk and Honey
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL!  My oldest son has been playing a female since EQ started!  He says he never got anything from anyone.  Nobody was high enough back then.  He says a SoW
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! My oldest son has been playing a female since EQ started! He
says he never got anything from anyone. Nobody was high enough
back then. He says a SoW was uber then! I didn't mind until once
I caught him sending a picture of a female classmate, claiming it
was him. I grounded him and threatened to tell his guildmates.



*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 7/9/03 at Angela Hughes wrote:

____Remember the good old days? You know, the days when being a
woman
____meant
____something on EQ??? Those golden days before the guys started
____impersonating
____women to get free gear from strangers? (Figured I'd throw a
topic
____related
____to the forum out in the air...)


Those who would give up essential liberty to purchase a little
temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
- Benjamin Franklin, motto to Historical Review of Pennsylvania

Muriel Hykes
